N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-6.6 - Steam fuel adjustment clauses generally

State Regulations
(a) Where provisions are made in steam
schedules for automatic adjustments of rates because of changes in cost of
fuel, public utilities may elect to file statements to their schedules in lieu
of amendments. Such statements shall not be a part of the schedule and shall
not bear a leaf designation. Statements to each schedule shall be numbered
consecutively, for example: "Statement No. 1 to P.S.C. No. 1," and "Statement

No. 2 to P.S.C. No. 1."
(b) A copy
of the effective statement shall be kept available with each schedule to which
it applies and may be attached to the schedule. Statements shall follow all
leaves and supplements which are part of the schedule. (c) Every such statement shall be filed not
less than three days prior to the date on which it is proposed to be
effective. Notes
